set.chimerical:
1. adjective: the product of an unchecked imagination
2. adjective: given to fantastic schemes
set.clandestine: adjective: kept secret especially because it is illicit
set.collusion: noun: secret agreement or cooperation especially for an illegal or deceitful purpose
set.delusive: adjective: giving a false or misleading impression
set.devious:
1. adjctive: using underhanded tactics to achieve goals
2. adjctive: deviating from an accepted course
set.spurious: adjctive: not being what it purports to be; fake or false; [of a line of reasoning] apparently but not actually valid
set.surreptitious: adjective: keept secret especially because it would not be approved of
set.abyss: noun: a deep or seemingly bottomless chasm
set.adamant: adjective: refusing to be persuaded or to change one's mind
set.anemia: noun: a condition in which the blood doesn't have enough healthy red blood cells
set.anesthetic: noun: a substance that induces insensitivity to pain; adjective: inducing insensitivity to pain
set.apathetic: adjective: showing or feeling no interest, enthusiasm, or concern
set.apolitical: adjective: not interested or involved in politics
set.atrophy:
1. verb: [of a tissue or organ] waste away; noun: the wasting away of a tissue or organ
2. verb: gradually decline in effectiveness due to underuse
